scripts.create:dev: docker run -itd --name flask_dev -p 5000:5000 -e PORT=5000 -v "$PWD":/usr/src/myapp -w /usr/src/myapp python:3 bash
scripts.install:dev: docker exec -it flask_dev pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.freeze:dev: docker exec -it flask_dev pip freeze > requirements.txt
scripts.rm:dev: docker stop flask_dev && docker rm flask_dev
scripts.create:test: docker run -itd --name flask_test -p 5001:5001 -e PORT=5001 -v "$PWD":/usr/src/myapp -w /usr/src/myapp python:3 bash
scripts.install:test: docker exec -it flask_test pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.freeze:test: docker exec -it flask_test pip freeze > requirements.txt
scripts.rm:test: docker stop flask_test && docker rm flask_test
